Name: Blue Nightcap
Ingredients: 20 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
10 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of float 3 espresso beans.
Review: Two different sherries, honey and coffee combine with cognac and walnut bitters to produce an after dinner cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Vito Nicotra at King Schulz Bar, Kassel, Germany.
